meaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>treasure</radical> on top of a <radical>narwhal</radical> who wears a <radical>towel</radical> that will grant your greatest <kanji>wish</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: In order to open the treasure and get your <kanji>wish</kanji>, you need the <reading>key</reading> (き). The narwhal knows where it's hidden, so you'll have to convince it to tell you where the key is.
